title: EndeavourOS Neo Provides a Stylish Route to Arch Linux
author: Jack Wallen
description: Endeavor OS is a beautiful desktop operating system, and anyone who wants to get a (an easier) taste of Arch Linux, this is a great option.
cntitle: EndeavourOS Neo 提供了一条时尚的 Arch Linux 使用途径
cndescription: EndeavourOS 是一款漂亮的桌面操作系统，任何想轻松体验 Arch Linux 的人都可以尝试一下。
